item.title: Recover from firewall not allowing ssh on port 22 in GCP instance
item.description: Tried to setup UFW or any other Firewall, but it disallows any traffic to port 22, which doesn’t let you ssh to your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) or Aamazon Web Services (AWS) instance? ðŸ˜– This article might be your savior. ðŸ˜Ž Follow the instructions below : Go to your VMâ€™s configuration page. Select the project. Then, Go to Compute -> Compute Engine -> VM Instances. Click the VM you want to recover Click Edit.
